trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>é gerado quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlar alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>é gerado quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventHandler, identifica o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, obter informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
